ygData.msgSnippet: As the ride gets more and more rough, Straight Shot finds herself stricken by fear.  A fear she had never known in her entire life.  She was happy that she had

As the ride gets more and more rough, Straight Shot finds herself stricken =
by fear.  A fear she had never known in her entire life.  She was happy tha=
t she had someone riding in front with her, even if it wasn't exactly an Au=
tobot or Maximal.  More and more, she begins to cling to Perceptor.  Even T=
ucson could sense her rapidly beating heart spark.

" Straight Shot, are yo=
u all right?"

She clings more to Perceptor.

"No.  I'm scared out of my sp=
ark."

Tucson could not deny the feelings he had now himself.

" Truthfully=
, so am I.  So am I."

Quickstride now leans over from the back of Tucson's=
 cab, in the back seat, and looks down to Perceptor.  He could tell that St=
raight Shot was completely fear stricken, and something she normally did no=
t display.

" I've never seen her this scared.  Well, one time I have.  Two=
 years ago, that nasty confrontation we had with the preds and the cons.  I=
t was right after she saw Tucson get hit.... Wait a minute...  Tucson can't=
 remember who hit him...  But, she was there, inside him when it happened."=


Straight Shot now rambles on about the incident two years ago.

" He neve=
r saw it comming, a blast that would take him off line almost instantly.  B=
ut I did Perceptor, I saw it.  And there was no time ta take the wheel and =
drive Tucson out of danger to avoid it.  But I wish I did have the time bec=
ause if I did, he wouldn'tve gone off line, gone blind, and we wouldn'tve l=
ost Rodimus two years ago.  And now, it's happening all over again."  

Qui=
ckstride listens to Straight Shot and then looks to Perceptor.

" No doubt =
she's probably seen the bot who's guilty of striking Tucson down."  

Strai=
ght Shot looks to everyone.  Courage returning somewhat.

"Yeah, I saw who =
did it."

Tucson Prime now turns his audio sensors to inside his cab.

"Str=
aight Shot?  You - saw who hit me?"

She swallows hard and nodds yes.

"Yea=
h, I did.  It was really hard to see who was up over us, but through the re=
ar view mirror in Tucson's cab, I saw who it was.  It happened so fast...  =
Came out of nowhere... "

Tucson was curious as to who had struck him, as h=
e continues his fast drive through the tunnel.

" Who was it Straight Shot?=
"

Her face stifens.

" Cyclonus.  He knows your blind spots and took advan=
tage of them.  Yes Tucson, you were struck by a slag drinking Decepticon."
=

Tucson's pace quickens in the tunnel.  New found rage builds within him.

=
" Then as soon as we find Rodimus Prime, we will tell him who was responsib=
le for the entire mess. And after that, I will PERSONALLY see to it that Cy=
clonus gets what he rightfully deserves. Now, let's find Rodimus!"

He turn=
s on a honing signal, mixed with special sonar equipment, he tries to bounc=
e harmless waves through the tunnel, attempting to pick up on the very allo=
y Rodimus is made of, to get a solid idea of how far he was within the tunn=
el.

" We're here Rodimus, we will not give up on you."

ooked at Tuscon as a strange

ck. They all fell into stasis
